description:
Take in the view and wear it too. The Lagorai shirt features a beautiful view from the La Sportiva headquarters to keep you stoked on the outdoors.

  • 100% organic cotton for natural breathability and a classic feel
  • Iconic Val Di Fiemme graphic to show your love of nature
  • Regular fit leaves room for you to move and air to flow
name: La Sportiva Lagorai Shirt - Men's
